sentences.en: He flashed a torch to guide me.
He flashed the torch on for a second.
He has always carried a torch for Barbara.
Meg has been carrying a torch for Paul for almost two years.
sentences.cn: 梅格对保罗单恋已经将近两年了.

sentences.en: One of the men shone a torch in his face.
sentences.cn: 其中一名男子用火把照着他的脸。

sentences.en: Pete's torch picked out the dim figures of Bob and Chang.
sentences.cn: 皮特的火把映出了鲍勃和张的模糊身影。

sentences.en: Shine the torch down here, please.
sentences.cn: 请把手电筒从这儿往下照.

sentences.en: Shine the torch on so that we can read the labels.
sentences.cn: 用手电筒照这个标签,我们好看得见.

sentences.en: Shine the torch on the lock while I try to get the key in.
sentences.cn: 我插钥匙时，请用手电筒照着锁头。

sentences.en: Shine the torch up into the rafters, please.
Suddenly the beam of an electric torch was flashed into his face.
sentences.cn: 忽然一道手电光射到他脸上.

sentences.en: The burglar shone his torch into the dark room.
sentences.cn: 盗贼将手电筒照进黑暗的房间.

sentences.en: The watchman shone his torch at us.
sentences.cn: 守门人用手电照着我们.

sentences.en: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.cn: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。
